aws_services: CloudFront, Lambda@Edge, S3, DynamoDB, CloudWatch, Route 53, IAM
background: A news platform requires personalized content delivery infrastructure to serve 60,000 daily readers with low-latency access and accurate engagement tracking. The system needs global content distribution via CloudFront with Lambda@Edge for dynamic personalization, S3 for versioned content storage, DynamoDB for user preferences and engagement analytics, and comprehensive CloudWatch monitoring for system health and performance metrics.
author: sivakumar-turing
